data.message:
Verse 2
As a youth I went from gritty to  puffing with frank Nitty  tell  your brother that I miss him didn’t waste no time didn’t diss him and I’m down  up in the city right off of 6 mile  I aint been to Clem town ( Mt. Clemens)  besides I can’t smile , seen so many locations most of them vile , but I rip this shit for the trail and I rip this shit  in the style  Its cost effective now so they keep us locked down in a frenzy with each other body slam or we tussle  but I am hard on my knuckles pray to God I won’t buckle a penny for a shekel  my logic for deduction them bitches they mean nothing why you here on and fronting ( watching 2Pac with the other GirlZ) 
Hook – 
See Woodie was a convict wit killers  pushing non stick  need etiquette  from  my bitch fucking with this mob shit come off this plantation  now what’s my explanation defy incarceration running with contention leaping over fences won’t let them apprehend  us.
sonja blade ghetto bible of hip hop  need producer...
